description:
Law`s power begins to fade, making him an easy target for Doflamingo`s vicious attacks. Meanwhile, Franky begs Luffy to let him fight alongside Soldier and the little people!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!
Le choc des Grands Corsaires. Law contre Doflamingo !
نزال بين اثنين من الشّيتشيبوكاي! لو ضدّ دوفلامينغو!
七武海対決 ローVSドフラミンゴ
